introduce.title: What is Seedance 2.0
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: Seedance 2.0 is ByteDance's cutting-edge multimodal AI video generation model, supporting both text-to-video and image-to-video creation with stunning cinematic quality and advanced physics simulation.

items.title: Text-to-Video Generation
items.description: Create dynamic videos from text descriptions with detailed scene, character, and action control.

items.title: Image-to-Video Animation
items.description: Upload static images and let AI breathe life into them with natural motion and effects.

items.title: Physics Simulation
items.description: Revolutionary 'acoustic physics field' technology for realistic object motion and lighting interactions.

items.title: Ultra-HD Output
items.description: Support for 1080p and 2K ultra-clear output, eliminating jitter and artifacts.

benefits.title: Why Choose Seedance 2.0
benefits.label: Benefits
benefits.description: Experience the next generation of AI video creation with unmatched quality and creative control.

items.title: State-of-the-Art AI Technology
items.description: Powered by ByteDance's latest multimodal AI research with acoustic physics field technology for breakthrough video generation.

items.title: Cinematic Visual Quality
items.description: Create videos with film-grade aesthetics, 1080p/2K resolution, perfect lighting, and professional color grading.

items.title: Complex Narrative Support
items.description: Multi-shot, multi-character storytelling with scene transitions maintaining high consistency across 30+ second videos.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have more questions? Contact us for support.

items.question: What is Seedance 2.0?
items.answer: Seedance 2.0 is ByteDance's next-generation multimodal AI video generation model. It supports both text-to-video and image-to-video creation, producing cinematic-quality videos with natural motion, physics simulation, and stunning visual effects.

items.question: What video resolutions are supported?
items.answer: Seedance 2.0 supports 1080p full HD and 2K ultra-clear output resolution. The advanced AI technology eliminates common issues like jitter and artifacts for professional-quality results.

items.question: How long can generated videos be?
items.answer: Seedance 2.0 can generate videos over 30 seconds in length, supporting complex narratives with multiple shots and characters while maintaining high scene consistency.

items.question: What visual styles are available?
items.answer: Multiple visual styles are supported including realistic, anime, cyberpunk, watercolor, and more. You can specify your preferred style in the text prompt.

items.question: What is 'acoustic physics field' technology?
items.answer: This is Seedance 2.0's revolutionary physics simulation technology that realistically models object motion, lighting interactions, and physical behaviors to create more natural and believable video content.

items.question: Can I animate existing images?
items.answer: Yes! With image-to-video functionality, you can upload static images and transform them into dynamic videos. The AI adds realistic motion, camera movements, and scene animations while preserving the original image style.

cta.title: Start Creating Amazing Videos
